title: Higher Education-Industry Collaboration in Science Through Workplace-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic theoretical knowledge and practical experience in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Project-based learning addressing real problems of local industries

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute workplace learning-based projects to address scientific challenges in local industries
Learners can establish sustainable knowledge-sharing systems through mutual trust-building with collaborating organizations
Learners can acquire practical scientific knowledge applicable to real-world tasks using microlearning content in mobile environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
